tool_description: Analyzes document headers and footers for compliance with academic formatting standards, including page numbering and running heads.

document_path.description: Path to the document file to analyze

style_guide.description: Style guide requirements: APA, MLA, Chicago, or Harvard

document_type.description: Type of document: manuscript, student_paper, or thesis

error_messages: File not found: The specified document path does not exist.
Unsupported style guide: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard].
Invalid document type: Use manuscript, student_paper, or thesis.
Document format not supported: Only Word documents and PDFs can be analyzed for headers/footers.
Access denied: Cannot read the specified document file.
usage: Provide document_path and style_guide to analyze header and footer compliance. Optionally specify document_type for more specific requirements.

header_compliant.description: Whether headers meet style guide requirements

footer_compliant.description: Whether footers meet style guide requirements

running_head_present.description: Whether running head is present when required

page_numbers_correct.description: Whether page numbering follows style guide
